summary: "Wake Me Up When September Ends" is a sad song by Green Day about the lead singer's dad dying in September 1982. It's also been linked to the September 11 attacks and Hurricane Katrina. The song is a rock ballad and was a hit, reaching number six on the US charts. Its music video tells a story about a couple separated by the Iraq War and won awards. The song is popular every September and has been covered by other musicians.
title: Wake Me Up When September Ends
